correct.text: The main page is OpenStreetMap.org; however, pages like osm.org or redirect to the main page.

questions.prompt: What is the web address of OpenStreetMap-OSM?

correct.text: OSM provides the following map styles in its main page: Standard, CyclOSM, Cyclism, Transport, OPNVKarte and Humanitarian.

questions.prompt: How many map styles OpenStreetMap provides in its main page?

answers: Provide a username, password and a valid email address

correct.text: It seems that you already have create an account, great!

questions.prompt: What do you need to open an account in OpenStreetMap?

correct.text: OSM can be modified with different editors, some from the computer (JOSM), some from the mobile (Vespucci, StreetComplete), some from browsers (iD, Potlatch, Level 0). And there others for different purposes.

questions.prompt: What are the editors to modify OSM?

correct.text: You can check the different elements in these pages: OSM Wiki Elements.

questions.prompt: What are the different kind of elements can be drawn on the map?

correct.text: The objects (nodes, ways, relations) can be described via Tags. OSM provides a very rich list of attributes that can be used in map features.

questions.prompt: How can you add information to the nodes, ways and relations?

title: Do you know the basics of OpenStreetMap.
